job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Force-X is seeking a Software Engineer for our client in Suwanee, GA. This is a full-time, Direct Hire position.</strong></p><p><br></p><p>QUALIFICATIONS:</p><ul><li>Requires at least 1 year relevant experience.</li><li>Must be a US person (US citizen or Green Card)</li><li>Adaptable, Flexible, Ability to Learn – must be able to work with different architecture and software </li><li>Experience with creative problem-solving – must be able to overcome obstacles with a unique perspective to benefit the team</li><li>Team Player – must be able to accept a role in a team and work well together, sharing goals, effort, and not afraid to ask for assistance</li><li>Experience with C++ and C# programming.</li><li>Experience with 3D software development (Gaming, Simulation, or Commercial) – experience in using modern 3D development software and understanding of engine-related optimization, limitation, and strengths.</li><li>Experience with object-oriented and component-oriented programming.</li><li>Experience with database management – interfacing with a database to external software for handling large amounts of save/load, and data management</li><li>Experience of programing with 3rd party SDK and API – utilizing 3rd party hardware and software</li><li>Experience with Unity – as well as packages, C#, and prefab management</li></ul><p><br></p><p>EDUCATION:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Engineering degree in computer science or relevant field</li></ul>
